bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Consumer products manufacturer founded in 1945 in Clichy, France. Founders Baron Marcel Bich and Edouard Buffard purchase factory 1945; first Cristal pen produced 1950. Societe Anonyme established 1953; Acquisitions: Biro Swan 1957; Waterman Pen 1958; Conte 1979; Tabur Marine 1981; Wite-Out 1992; Tipp-Ex 1997; Stypen 2004; Pimaco 2006. Products: Cristal pen 1950; retractable ball point 1965; 4-color pen 1970; pocket lighter 1973; disposable razor 1975; Bic Evolution pen made from recycled materials 1993
